00040   IVideoPicture*
00041   IVideoPicture :: make(IPixelFormat::Type format, int width, int height)

00048   IVideoPicture :: make(
00049       com::xuggle::ferry::IBuffer* buffer,
00050       IPixelFormat::Type format, int width, int height)
00051   {

00053     return VideoPicture::make(buffer, format, width, height);

00056 
00057   IVideoPicture*
00058   IVideoPicture :: make(IVideoPicture *srcFrame)
00059   {
00060     IVideoPicture* retval = 0;
00061     Global::init();
00062     try
00063     {
00064       if (!srcFrame)
00065         throw std::runtime_error("no source data to copy");
00066 
00067       retval = IVideoPicture::make(srcFrame->getPixelType(), srcFrame->getWidth(), srcFrame->getHeight());
00068       if (!retval)
00069         throw std::runtime_error("could not allocate new frame");
00070       
00071       if (!retval->copy(srcFrame))
00072         throw std::runtime_error("could not copy source frame");
00073     }
00074     catch (std::bad_alloc &e)
00075     {
00076       VS_REF_RELEASE(retval);
00077       throw e;
00078     }
00079     catch (std::exception & e)
00080     {
00081       VS_LOG_DEBUG("got error: %s", e.what());
00082       VS_REF_RELEASE(retval);
00083     }
00084     return retval;
00085   }
00086 }}}
